titles.title: Insurance Accountability and Transparency Act

To amend the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act to require group health plans and health insurance coverage to have in place a process to self-audit information listed in publicly accessible provider directories of such plans and coverage.
Insurance Accountability and Transparency Act

bill.summary:
Insurance Accountability and Transparency Act
This bill requires private health insurance plans to periodically contact providers listed in publicly available directories to verify those providers' contact information and status within the network of such plans.
